column4: I can not edit my /etc/init.d/rc file because of admin rights, how do I get around this to change the concurrency=shell?
I can not edit my /etc/init.d/rc file because of permission rights, how do I get around this to change the concurrency=shell to speed up boot time on my pc?
sudo nano to edit or gksudo gedit
I typed that in the terminal and nothing popped up...besides editing on the bottom...I need the notepad thing to edit...then save?
you need to add the path and filename you want to edit after those commands
